scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.e2e:done-positive:log:
bash -lc 'set -e; LOG_FILE=/tmp/miruny-done-positive-e2e.log; TMP_FILE=$(mktemp); TS=$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z"); npm run e2e -- done-positive.spec.ts > "$TMP_FILE" 2>&1 || STATUS=$?; STATUS=${STATUS:-0}; cat "$TMP_FILE"; RESULT_LINE=$(grep -E "^[[:space:]]*[0-9]+ passed \(.*" "$TMP_FILE" | tail -n 1 || true); if [ -z "$RESULT_LINE" ]; then RESULT_LINE="(no done-positive passed summary)"; fi; if [ "$STATUS" -eq 0 ]; then PASS="PASS"; else PASS="FAIL"; fi; printf "Time: %s
Command: npm run e2e -- done-positive.spec.ts
Result: %s
Pass: %s
" "$TS" "$RESULT_LINE" "$PASS" > "$LOG_FILE"; rm -f "$TMP_FILE"; exit $STATUS'
